metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18388 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
A NULL pointer dereference in vrend_renderer.c in virglrenderer through 0.8.0 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service via malformed commands.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18388` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer1 - 0.8.1-6
virgl-server - 0.8.1-6
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> intrusive backport to bionic and eoan Nothing in bionic actually uses this package, so we will not be releasing a fix for it. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.1-6').
